meaning: Ending so soon? / Don't stop streaming yet. (Lit. "It's only 8 o'clock")
description: Common in live streams. When a streamer ends early, viewers joke "It's only 8 o'clock" regardless of the actual time.

examples.chinese: 主播要直播了吗！才八点
examples.translation: Is the streamer ending? It's way too early!
It's still early, please don't stop.

examples.chinese: 亚达哟！才八点！你不要下播啊
examples.translation: No way! It's too early! Don't go offline.
